The said day It was appontit and accordit betuix the pro
uest bailyes and Consall one that ane part and richerd Wrycht
anent the mending and reformacioun' of the stepill of the tolbutht
in maner and forme as follouis' that is to say the said richerd' sale
god willing mend and reforme the stepill forsaid ennowe
and vteutht sufficiently and Substantisly in ale thingis as
efferis bar and' thai sale fynd and deliuer to him ale stuff
conuenient tharto within the said tolbutht and' fynd him seruandis to

mendit thai sall refund and pay to the said richerd' tene markis and' sale
entir to the reformyng of It incontinent and thai sale pay to him xl s' at his

The said day It was statut and ordanit for the commone proffit
weill and gud reull of this burgh be the prouest bailyes and consaile
that nay burges within this burgh sale haue hay forstallar vndir
him to pas in quintray to forstale the burgh' in bing of woll hidis
nor skynnis vnder the pane of fiwe merkis and that nay merchand'
sale tak ane vthir mennis merchand out of his hand vnto the tyme
that he haue counptit and' raknit finaly with his merchand' and'
be fred' of him vndir the pane of fiwe markis

Item that nay merchand man oppin his butht dur to sell or by
or do ony merchandice one ane sonday vndir the pan' of ane
pund of walx or the waile of It to be applyit to the haly
blud licht

Item It is statut and ordanit that na taulche be barrellit
nor schippit vnder the pane of eschet to the toune quhar it may
be comprehendit and viij s' of the sellar for ane amerciament and'
thir personis and gudis to be dangerit be the kingis hienes

Item it is statut and ordanit that nay swyne be haldin withtin
this toun' vteuthe band or ane ring in thar wort vnder the
pane of eschet of tham and' viij s' vnforgevin And gif thai
be fundin vteuthe band and without ring in thar wort fiften' dais
beand runyn thai salbe eschet and lesum to be sclan' quhareuere thai ma
be fundin

Item that ale forstallaris salbe accusit and punist for thar forstalling
be the lowabill statutis and' consuetud of the burghe

Item that ale fut chepman berand paperis one thar bakis salbe free
to cum and pas saiffly to the said burgh' without ony accusacioun' or
perall of forstalling of the burgh'

Item It statut et cetera that nay litstaris beraris blex blekstaris
skinneris nor craftismen' sale wesche thar claithtis hidis skynnis
nor vthir stuf in the common' riuolis loche nor wattiris and that nay
red fische quhit fische claithtis nor vthir stuf that may Infect the
wattir be cassin nor weschin in It

Item that nay drauchtis be haldin apon' the said loche nor riuolis
nor wattiris in preue nor appert bot vtirly distroyt

Item that ane preue Inquest be takin of ale vnelauchfull personis
hous' draucht haldaris and walteris and for ale vtheris poyntis pertenyng tharto
oppin and punist be the law

Item that ale candilmakaris has candile reddy to sell to ale mane
and thai salbe sellit be richt wecht the pund for iij d' smale weikit
and dry

Item that nay aill be sellit derrar this yeir than viij d' the gallon' be fre
folkis and' vj d' the gallon' be vnefrehaldaris

Item that ale baxteris sale haue breid of quhet reddy sufficient gud and'
clene stuf penny breid' and tua penny breid' to serue the toune

Item that dilegent Inquesicioun' be takin of ale Infect' personis with this
strangis seiknes of nappillis for the sawite of the toun' and' the personis
beand Infectit thar witht be chargit to keip thame securly in thar hous'
and vthir placis fra the haill folkis et cetera

Item that four sergeandis with thar cunnaris pas' Ilkane oulk throu thar quartaris
of the toun' ande cast ande cun the ale ande set it eftir thar aithtis that is
to say gude prouable aile for viij d' the gallone Ande vthiris for vj d' the gallon'

Item that the flessouris sale sal na flesche quhile It be prisit ande euere settirday
the bailyeis about circualy sale pas with the flesch prisaris ande set it the
eftir thar aithtis

Item that quhit fischaris sale present the fisch' to the mercat and sele na fisch'
to land' men' nor yhit in gret quhile the toun' be seruit And' that nay
regratoris of quhit fisch' quhile the toun' be seruit

Item that thar salbe Certane personis ordanit to cleng the toun' ande dicht
the causais Ilkane fyr hous' payand' thame ane penny

Item that nane infeckit folkis with the seiknes of napillis be haldin
at the commone fleschous' or with the flessouris baxtaris broustaris or ladin
naris for sauite of the toun' ande the personis infeckit sale keip
thame quyat in thar houss' yhardis or vys quiat placis quhill thai
be haill for the infectioun' of thar nychtbouris

Item that na wittoll be housit quhile it be present to the mercat and'
at the mercat be kepit and ale caik baxstaris and huxstaris be ex
pectit thar fray

Item that na craftis man by hidis bot as the law requiris that is to
say the long ande the horne elik lang'

Item that na craftis men bark ande scharp batht eftir the forme of
oure souerance lordis lawis

Item that craftis mennis wiffis litstaris cordonaris vsing brewing
haue a leid to brew in ande ane vthir for thar craft

Item that na persone hald' swyne fyr ande elding in a hous' and
that the bailyeis cers' thar quartaris four' tymes in the yeir and'
expell vnlauchfull folkis and vnlauchfull houss'

Item that nay onefreman keipe oppin butht within this burghe nor haue licence
to saile in merchandice vndir the pane of xl s' Ande gif the denys of the gilde
Sufferis tham to saile a keip oppin butht thai sale ansuer' for the said xl s'

Item that the mettis and mesoris be assait throw the haile toune and quhar' thai be
fundin vnrichtuis' be distroit and the avnaris of tham pvnist be the lawe

Item that ale couparis mak Sufficient barrellis of mesour eftir the law of the
Realme and consuetud' of this burghe and Ilkan name Set his avne merk
to his avne werk Ande quhay falyeis heruntile to be pvnist eftir the tenor
and Rigour of th law

Item that nay man Intromett nor merchandice mak with vthir mennys
gudis vndir colour allegeand' thame to be thar propir gudis vndir the pane
of x merkis

Item that nay mvk laid' within this burghe at ony mannis yet or dur'
ly langir thar' thane xxiiij houris vndir the pane of viij s' vnforgevin
and the said' mvk to be fre tile euere persone that sale ples' to tak or
leid' it avay

The said' day Jonhne litstar exponit how it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
that Jonhne Cuk in ellone suld' haue brocht ane Act of the Consistory court
that he was dischargit of ane par' of Splentis be p the said' Johne and
suld' haue presentit the said' Act befor the balyeis one Wedinsday the sext
day of October' Instant Ande gif he falyeit in the bringin of the said'
act the said' day that he suld' pay viij s' to the saide Johne litstar for the
said' Splentis And' becaus' he falyeit in the presenting of the act the said'
Johne litstar allegit he suld' pay to him the said' viij s'

Strathachin Katherine richart the Relict of Johne stevinsone eldar'
the relict of Johne steuinsone yongar the wif of Dauid adamsone the
wif of Androw lousone the wif of cristy prat the wif of mathowe

was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for Selling of xij d' aile
and brekin of common' ordinance And' Ilkan of thame was in amerciament
of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum
Ande at the request of the counsale present for the tyme the balyeis
supersedit the vptakin of the said' vnlauys et cetera with this condicioun'
gif euer the saide personis or ony ane of thame sellis xij d' aile
hereftir thai sale pay batht thar' vnlavis vnforgevin

head.add: the assignacioun' of the Justice myllys to the chaplannis of Abirdene and of the malys of the samyn

div.p:
The said' day the prouest balyeis Counsale and diuers' of the communite
with ane Consent and assent grauntit and frelie assignit to the Court
and chaplannis of the quer' of thar parys kirk ale and haile the malys
and Rentis of thar Justice myllis with thar pertinence of ale termes
and yeris to Cum ay and to Su the tyme thai be Content and pait of
ale Somes aving to thame for the vphaldin of the haly blude mes'
of the yeris and termes bigane and to Cum gevand' and grantand' to the said'
chaplannis and thar Successoris fule pouer' to lift rais' and vptak the the said'
malis and fermis yerlie and termlie at thar' avne handis and of thar ressatis
acquitance to gif

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die octo
bris Anno quo supra

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that thomas Wode officiar' to William Craufurd' of fetheray hed preuit
Sufficientlie that Robert murray hed' resauit fra him iiiijor merkis vsuale
money of Scotland' in the hame of Androw murray his fadir et cetera and that the
said' Robert awe to releiwe him of the said' four' merkis and the borghe'
fundin one the said' Robert tharapon was fundin availe et cetera for the quhilkis
the saide Robert was in amerciament of the Court and that was gevin for dome

Eodem die Willelmus Craufurd de fotheray fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Johannem Andirsone burgensem dicti burgi suum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem dans et concedens
sibi suam liberam et Integam presentatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo
ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Roberto murray quatuor marcas monete scocie
et de receptis acquietandum et cetera Ac si necesse fuerit prosequendum agendum defendendum
Ceteram omnia et Singula faciendum et extendendum promittens to Rato et grato

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis
Octobris Anno quo supra

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Johne
Cuk officiar' to bring Duncan Wandy befor thame tile ansuer' to Androw
litstar as Souerte dravin and fundin to the said' Officiar' as he allegis be Johne
mar' in tyrj for iiij pec' of woll jC lenterinwair' and viij d' of Siluere aving
to the said' Androw be the said' Johne mair'

The said' day sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht Johne Colisone and Dauid Ruthirfurd' burges
of the said' burgh come caucionaris and Souerte tile gilbert menyeis prouest of the said'
burghe and oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin in the Soueraste
wis' coniunctlie and Seueralie Renunciand' the benefice of diuisioun' for ane last
of Salmond' or the valour' of it quhilkis the said' gilbert prouest has eschetit
tile our Souerane lordis hienes pertening to Duncan of fyf burges of the said' burghe
gif the said' last of Salmond' beis decernit eschaet be our Souerane lordis hie
nes and his lordis of Counsale Ande gif it beis nocht fundin eschaet to pay
the Custome of the said' ane last of Salmond' to the Custumaris of the said'
burghe'

The said' day Duncane of fyf burges of the said' burghe oblist him be the
fatht of his bodie his handis vphaldin his ayris executoris and assignez
in the Souerast wis' and bande of obligacioun' to freithe releiwe and'
keipe ser Johne ruthirfurde knicht Jonhne Colisone and Dauid Ruthirfurd'
burges of the said' burghe thar ayris executoris and assignez skathles and fre
of ane last of Salmond' and the vale of it and of ale summonce and
chargis that happinnis to Cum apon' thame tharanent for the quhilkis
thai ar' bundin coniunctlie and Seueralie for him to gilbert menyeis provest
of the said' burghe In our Souerane lordis nayme gif it happinnis the said'
last of Salmond' be fundin eschet tile our Souerane lordis hienes be the lordis
of Counsale

Eodem die Willelmus stile conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore thome chamer

Eodem die patricius leslie Junior deuenit plegius legalis quod Dauid fynne erit
Indempnes pro Willelmo stile aliter quam per viam Juris Et Andreas meldrum
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis pro dicto Dauid aliter
quam per viam Juris et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum plegios suos indempnes
de de huiusmodi fideiussione et cetera

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure gilberti menyeis anno Dominj

Andreas brabnire ad requestum nobilis virj Alexander fraser de phillortht militis
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento Ac Soluet
quatuor marcas ad penticostes festum proxima futura decanus gilde Residuum sibi
remittitur ad Instanciam dicti militis
Dauide talyour alias Williamsone reciptur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento quia sponsauit
filiam burgensis Ac Soluet decanus gilde sex s' et octo d' in festo pentecostes proxima sequens
Andreas Wobstar recipitur in liberum burgensem quia Sponsauit filiam burgensis prestito Solito
Juramento Ac Soluet quinque s' in festo pentecostes proximo futuro
Alexander tulidef recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento ac Soluet xl
solidos decanus gilde pro quibus gilbertus tulidef deuenit plegius
Alexander King gracia prepositj decanorum gilde et Consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
